182.title: Captain America Comics
notes:
Periodical that ran from 1941 to 1954. Features include:
  • Captain America (1941-1954)
  • Amazing Spy Adventures (May 1941)
  • Are You a Detective? (July 1949)
  • Dippy Diplomat (Sept. 1942 - Apr. 1943)
  • Father Time (Sept. 1941 - Mar. 1942)
  • The Fighting Fool (Sept. 1942)
  • The Fighting Yank (Aug. 1942)
  • Headline Hunter (Aug. 1941 - Apr. 1942)
  • Human Torch (Oct. 1942 - Sept. 1954)
  • Hurricane (Mar. 1941 - Feb. 1942)
  • The Imp (Mar. - July 1942)
  • Let's Play Detective (Oct. 1943 - Mar. 1949)
  • Secret Stamp (Apr. 1942 - June 1943)
  • Sub-Mariner (Nov. 1942; Sept. 1948; Jan. 1949)
  • Tuk: Caveboy (Mar. - Aug. 1941)
  • Witness (Mar. - May 1949)
This list originates from the one in Howard Keltner's Index to Golden Age Comic Books (Detroit, Mich. : J. Bails, 1976)
